Meet the Businesses Making a Positive Impact on Society

Semrush Select celebrates organizations committed to Corporate Social Responsibility

Recognizing companies that inspire change

Semrush is celebrating businesses that are cultivating kindness and giving back.

Our Semrush Select initiative aims to drive awareness of global issues like sustainability, gender equality, and anti-racism, while showcasing companies uplifting society through their actions and charitable donations.

Semrush Select recognizes two businesses every year. Honorees receive a complimentary Semrush guru subscription for 12 months and a matched donation between $5,000 and $25,000 to a charity of their choice.

Meet our first honoree

Boody is an everyday essentials designer based in Sydney, Australia. Powered by the mission to champion a better future, Boody uses sustainable and eco-friendly materials to craft simple, quality clothing products like underwear, sleepwear, loungewear, and activewear.

Boody’s fit-for-all clothing can be found at over 4,000 retailers and online in 15 countries and counting.

Boody’s supported cause

In 2023, Boody donated $17,271 worth of clothing to Circle of Love Center in Georgia.

Circle of Love Center is an emergency safe shelter and resource center for survivors of domestic violence and their children. The shelter offers protection and essential, life-changing services that support healing and help its clients move forward.

Services offered include safe shelter, 24/7 hotline access, counseling, case management, legal and financial support, employment, and housing assistance.

Semrush humbly matched the $17,271 donation to the Circle of Love Center in Georgia.

Boody has also partnered with organizations like Goodbye Malaria and Susan G. Komen, showing their continued dedication to bettering the world.

“At Semrush, we know that so many of our customers are passionate about making the world a better place, and Semrush Select is our way of applauding the real change-makers. Semrush Select is not just about supporting our customers and the great work they are doing; it’s about sparking inspiration and uniting everyone to improve the world around us, because businesses are amongst the most well placed organizations to make a difference to society, no matter how big or small they are.”

Andrew Warden

Chief Marketing Officer at Semrush

About Semrush

Semrush is a leading online visibility management SaaS platform that enables businesses globally to run search engine optimization, pay-per-click, content, social media and competitive research campaigns and get measurable results from online marketing. Semrush offers insights and solutions for companies to build, manage, and measure campaigns across various marketing channels.

Semrush is headquartered in Boston and has offices in Philadelphia, Trevose, Austin, Dallas, Amsterdam, Barcelona, Belgrade, Berlin, Limassol, Prague, Warsaw, and Yerevan. To read more about the Semrush Select initiative, please visit our newsroom here. If you think our business has what it takes to be the next Semrush Select honoree, please reach out to pr@semrush.com
